CodeList.Name: Priority of Tuberculosis Contact

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the prioritization of tuberculosis contacts.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An individual that has tested positive for pulmonary, laryngeal, or pleural tuberculosis and may or may not present with cavitary disease.
An individual that has had limited exposure to an individual with tuberculosis and has a low probability of having had a recent infection.
An individual that has tested negative for pulmonary, laryngeal, or pleural tuberculosis but has had a non-cavitary chest x-ray that is consistent with tuberculosis.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Priority of Tuberculosis Contact Terminology
